title: Shrimad Bhagavad Gita
description: Shrimad Bhagavad Gita is a sacred Hindu scripture that contains the teachings of Lord Krishna as revealed to Arjuna in the battle of Mahabharata.

authors.name: Maharshi Vedavyasa
authors.bio: Vedavyasa is a revered figure in Hinduism, known for being the author of the Shrimad Bhagavad Gita, one of the two major Sanskrit epics of ancient India.

title: Yoga Sutras of Patanjali
description: Yoga Sutras of Patanjali are a collection of 195 aphorisms that form the core of the Yoga tradition.

authors.name: Maharishi Patanjali
authors.bio: Maharishi Patanjali is a revered figure in Hinduism, known for being the author of the Yoga Sutras, one of the two major Sanskrit epics of ancient India.

title: Katha Upanishad
description: Katha Upanishad is a story of Nachiketa and his interaction with Yama.

authors.name: Maharshi Vedavyasa
authors.bio: Vedavyasa is a revered figure in Hinduism, known for being the author of the Shrimad Bhagavad Gita, one of the two major Sanskrit epics of ancient India.

title: Mandukya Upanishad
description: Mandukya Upanishad covers the concept of the self and the universe.

authors.name: Maharshi Vedavyasa
authors.bio: Vedavyasa is a revered figure in Hinduism, known for being the author of the Shrimad Bhagavad Gita, one of the two major Sanskrit epics of ancient India.

title: Isavasya Upanishad
description: Isavasya Upanishad talks about the nature of the self and the universe.

authors.name: Maharshi Vedavyasa
authors.bio: Vedavyasa is a revered figure in Hinduism, known for being the author of the Shrimad Bhagavad Gita, one of the two major Sanskrit epics of ancient India.

title: The Autobiography of a Yogi
description: The Autobiography of a Yogi is a book by Paramahansa Yogananda that tells the story of his spiritual journey and the master.
